text.en: All the victors of the three times, in their abode, the trikāya realms;
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwé zhukné ku sum zhing

text.en: The host of vidyādharas of the wisdom, sign, and oral lineages
text.en-trans: khachö nyerzhi wang puk lasok la

text.en: In the twenty-four celestial realms of Magnetizing, and so forth;
text.en-trans: zhukpé gong da nyengyü rigdzin tsok

text.en: The boundless host of victorious peaceful and wrathful yidams;
The ocean of ḍākas, ḍākinīs, and oath-bound ones—
I pray to you all! Remove adversity and obstacles!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so galkyen barché sol

text.en: Spontaneously fulfill our wishes in accordance with the path of awakening!
text.en-trans: changchub lam tün sampa lhün gyi drub

text.en: Before long, may we capture the kingdom of the three kāyas!
text.en-trans: namzhik ku sum gyalsa zinpar shok
